1605790.name: Almighty: Kill Your Gods Supporters Pack
1605790.description:
Do you hear the call of the Ancestors and want to show your support, build yourself a worthy Alpha with the Supporter Pack DLC:

• 20 customization transmogs of Tails, Horns, Material, Gauntlets and Amulets from the Ancestor set, Ancestor Steel set, Ancestor Regal set, and Ancestor Black Jade set. Customize the look of any gear to look your best!

• 14 crafting blueprints for all tiers to strengthen your skills, including the Ancestor Gauntlet and 13 Ancestor Amulets!

• 1000 Gold
• 10 Soul Gems
• 10 Kindred
• 500 Asteria
• 500 Eos
• The gratitude of the whole Almighty team!

Important note: By buying this DLC pack, you are first and foremost showing your support for the team. The items above are just a bonus!
1605790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
